Spells:
Air Walk (D4 Tran): Touched walks on air for 200 min
Animal Messenger (D2 Ench): R75' Tiny animal target goes to specified place for 20 dy
Animal Shapes (D8 Tran): R75' 20 willing targets in 15' radius become chosen animal w/up to 20 HD for 20 hr
Antipathy (D9 Ench): R75' Named creature kind or alignment avoids 20 10' cu for 40 hr (DC 21 Will -4 dex)
Atonement (D5 Abju): Touched recovers alignment and holy powers
Blight (D4 Necr): Touched plant suffers 15d6 HP (DC 16 Fort half)
Bull's Strength (D2 Tran): Touched gains +4 Strength for 20 min
Charm Animal (D1 Ench): R75' Target treats self as trusted friend for 20 hr (DC 13 Will neg)
Control Water (D4 Tran): R1200' Raises or lowers 20 10'x10'x2' of water 40' for 200 min
Create Water (D0 Conj): R75' Creates 40 gallons of pure water
Detect Poison (D0 Divi): R75' Self detects poison in target, DC 20 Wis or Alchemy check for type
Detect Snares And Pits (D1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on traps for conc or 200 min
Dispel Magic (D4 Abju): R300' Self d20+10 check vs. 11+caster level cancels spells or effects in 20' radius
Fire Seeds (D6 Conj): Touched 4 acorn grenades inflict 20d6 total or 8 berry bombs detonate on command to inflict 1d8+20 in 5' radius (DC 18 Ref half) for 200 min
Flare (D0 Evoc): R75' Target dazzled for 1 min (DC 12 Fort neg)
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1 next attack, save, or skill check for 1 min
Heal (D7 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 150 HP and removes negative conditions
Hide From Animals (D1 Abju): 20 touched become imperceptible to animals for 200 min
Jump (D1 Tran): Touched gains +30 Jump for 20 min
Magic Stone (D1 Tran): 3 touched stones attack at +1 and inflict 1d6+1 HP (2d6+2 HP vs. undead) for 30 min
Mass Cat's Grace (D6 Tran): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius gain +4 Dexterity for 20 min
Mass Cure Moderate Wounds (D7 Conj): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius heal (undead suffer) 2d8+20 HP (DC 19 Will half)
Mass Cure Serious Wounds (D8 Conj): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius heal (undead suffers) 3d8+20 HP (DC 20 Will half)
Mending (D0 Tran): R10' Repairs minor damage to 1 lb object
Neutralize Poison (D3 Conj): Touched neutralized 200 min, immunized, or detoxified
Poison (D3 Necr): Touched suffers -1d10 Constitution immediately and again after 1 min (DC 22 Fort neg)
Repel Wood (D6 Tran): Repels 60' line of unanchored wood for 20 min
Reverse Gravity (D8 Tran): R300' Objects in 10 10' cu fall upward for 20 rd
Shambler (D9 Conj): R300' Creates 1d4+2 11 HD shambling mounds in 15' radius that fight for 7 dy or guard for 7 mo
Shapechange (D9 Tran): Self becomes different animal of any size 1/rd for 200 min
Sleet Storm (D3 Conj): R1200' Sleet in 40' radius blinds, requires DC 10 Balance to move for 20 rd
Soften Earth And Stone (D2 Tran): R75' 20 10'x4' squares of wet earth/dry earth/natural stone become mud/sand/clay
Speak With Animals (D1 Divi): Self converses w/animals for 20 min
Spike Stones (D4 Tran): R300' Spikes on stony ground in 20' sq inflict 1d8 HP each 5' movement and slow to half speed for 1 dy (DC 16 Ref neg) for 20 hr
Storm Of Vengeance (D9 Conj): R1200' 360' radius storm deafens for 1d4x10 min (DC 21 Fort neg), then rains acid inflicting 1d6 HP, then generates 6 bolts lightning that inflict 10d6 HP each (DC 21 Ref half), then hail that inflicts 5d6 HP, then obscures vision for 6 rd
Summon Nature's Ally III (D3 Conj): R75' 1 3rd-, 1d3 2nd-, or 1d4+1 1st-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Summon Swarm (D2 Conj): R75' Swarm of bats, rats, or spiders attacks nearest creature for conc + 2 rd
Sunburst (D8 Evoc): R1200' 80' radius blinds and inflicts 6d6 HP (undead and oozes 20d6 HP) (DC 20 Ref half, not blind)
Transmute Metal To Wood (D7 Tran): R1200' Metal in 40' radius becomes wood (-2 attack, damage, AC)
Transmute Mud To Rock (D5 Tran): R300' 40 10' cu of mud becomes rock
Transmute Rock To Mud (D5 Tran): R300' 40 10' cu of natural rock becomes mud
Transport Via Plants (D6 Conj): Self and 6 willing targets teleport via like plants for 1 rd
Tree Shape (D2 Tran): Self becomes tree for 20 hr
Unhallow (D5 Evoc): 40' radius from touched gives +2 AC and saves vs. good, suppresses mental control, bars contact by summoned good creatures, imposes -4 turn undead penalty, gives +4 rebuke undead bonus, and evokes bane spell
Virtue (D0 Tran): Touched gains +1 temporary HP for 1 min
Wall Of Thorns (D5 Conj): R300' 20 10' cu thorns inflict (25-AC) HP/rd when passing through for 200 min
Warp Wood (D2 Tran): R75' Warps 20 wooden objects in 20' radius (DC 14 Will neg)
Wind Walk (D7 Tran): Self and 6 touched vaporize and move 60 MPH for 20 hr
Wind Wall (D3 Evoc): R300' 200'x5' curtain of air scatters objects, deflects arrows and bolts for 20 rd

Spell Penetration: +2 checks to overcome spell resistance
